tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE real_estate_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    buyer_name VARCHAR(255),
    seller_name VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    contract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE real_estate_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    buyer_id INT,
    seller_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    contract_type VARCHAR(50),
    contract_date DATE,
    contract_terms TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT NOT NULL,
    buyer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    seller_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contract_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES properties(property_id)
);

CREATE TABLE payments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT NOT NULL,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE real_estate_properties (
  property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE contracts (
  contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT NOT NULL,
  buyer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  seller_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contract_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES real_estate_properties(property_id)
)

CREATE TABLE payments (
  payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contract_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES contracts(contract_id)
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  payment_id INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (payment_id) REFERENCES payments(payment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    client_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES RealEstateProperties(property_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SmartContracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    contract_text TEXT,
    contract_status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES RealEstateProperties(property_id)
);
